localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Parler gets booted and blacklisted from every American site. They move to Russian servers and Americans go wild. How dumb are you?
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

localize.full_text: Parler被所有美国网站踢出并列入黑名单。他们转移到俄罗斯服务器上，美国人就会疯狂。你有多蠢？
Parler被所有美國網站踢出並列入黑名單。他們轉移到俄羅斯服務器上，美國人就會瘋狂。你有多蠢？

previous.excerpt: Using Instil, you can teach what you love to students across the globe in a live format. It could be an academic subject, hobby or skill, lifestyle subjects, bootcamps, or anything else.
